caption.title: Maximal non-toxic doses (MNTD) of Cl - channel inhibitors and Ribavirin.
caption.p: Huh7 (A) and C6/36 cells (B) were incubated with increasing concentrations of Cl - channel inhibitors, Ribavirin and carrier (DMSO) only. Cell viability was determined by MTT assay after 6 hrs and 24 hrs of treatment, respectively (n â‰¥ 3). Arrows indicate the maximal non-toxic doses. Error bars represent standard deviation. One-way ANOVA was performed to compare samples to untreated cells.
